_header: O mistress mine til you I me commend
_description: A Balade to his Mistress — three 8-line stanzas, including refrain, ‘O maistres myn till ȝow I me commend’

Banna.First Lines:
O maistres myn till ȝow I me commendall haill my hairt Sen
                    þat ȝe Haif in cure…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Lat me anis say þat I ȝour freindschip fandO
                    maistres myn till ȝow I me commend
